feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
